name: The Virtual Gurus
description:
We are a virtual service company offering a full range of administrative, receptionist, social media, bookkeeping, and web development services at your fingertips. Our mission is to be the preeminent provider of virtual services in North America. To accomplish this, we hire the most qualified staff (the “Gurus”) that share our passion for providing quality workmanship and timely results.
Whether you are an independent consultant, a small start-up company, or an established business – The Virtual Gurus is here to support you and your success. Our Gurus have amassed years of industry experience and specialize in serving the North American market. With our top-notch team and project management platform you can feel confident delegating your work to us knowing that we’ll get it done…accurately and on-time!
